Package com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.datasources

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LocalPhotosDataSource.OnReloadLocalPhotosListener
    We provide reload method, that read all the info files from the storage, that run run on another thread, if you want to use it, you must send as a parameter listener reload method call afterLoading method, on the caller thread, after reload all the files from the storage.
    PhotoCacheDataSource.OnImageFileSavedListener
    To use PhotoCacheDataSource.saveImageFile(PhotoCache, String, int, OnImageFileSavedListener) saveImageFile} you must send a listener as a parameter so we can notify you with the results, in the one appropriate method from those methods: PhotoCacheDataSource.OnImageFileSavedListener.onSaved(PhotoCache) - when successfully saved, PhotoCacheDataSource.OnImageFileSavedListener.onAlreadySaved(PhotoCache) - when a file with same name already exist, PhotoCacheDataSource.OnImageFileSavedListener.onSavingFailed(IOException) - when an I/O error occurred.
    PhotoCacheDataSource.OnPhotoCacheArrivedListener
    To use getPhotoCache you must send a listener as a parameter so we can notify you with the results, in the appropriate method from those: PhotoCacheDataSource.OnPhotoCacheArrivedListener.onResult(PhotoCache), PhotoCacheDataSource.OnPhotoCacheArrivedListener.onError(Exception).
    ThumbPhotoDataSource.OnThumbPhotoArrivedListener
    To use getToplistPhotos, getLatestPhotos, getRandomPhotos, you must send a listener as a parameter so we can notify you with the results.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LocalPhotosDataSource
    A Singleton that hold 1 - a map with local (downloaded) photos names (unique ids) as a keys, and localPhotos objects as values.
    PhotoCacheDataSource
    API that provide asynchronous methods: 1 - getPhotoCache that receive listener as a parameter and then get the image with her details from the internet and cache it, and then call one of the listener methods (onResult, onError, depends the situation) and run it on the caller thread - main thread.
    ThumbPhotoDataSource
    API that provide 3 asynchronous methods: (important note : every method work in synchronize way so the call order is saved, you will get the the thumb order as the call method order).
